verses.verse: And the second <S%H8145><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> even for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> and their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was within <S%H8432><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>
And they had in their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> Beersheba, <S%H884><s%> and Sheba, <S%H7652><s%> and Moladah, <S%H4137><s%>
And Hazarshual, <S%H2705><s%> and Balah, <S%H1088><s%> and Azem, <S%H6107><s%>
And Eltolad, <S%H513><s%> and Bethul, <S%H1329><s%> and Hormah, <S%H2767><s%>
And Ziklag, <S%H6860><s%> and Bethmarcaboth, <S%H1024><s%> and Hazarsusah, <S%H2701><s%>
And Bethlebaoth, <S%H1034><s%> and Sharuhen; <S%H8287><s%> thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> and their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
Ain, <S%H5871><s%> Remmon, <S%H7417><s%> and Ether, <S%H6281><s%> and Ashan; <S%H6228><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> and their villages: <S%H2691><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the villages <S%H2691><s%> that were round <S%H5439><s%> about these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> to Baalathbeer, <S%H1192><s%> Ramath <S%H7418><s%> of the south. <S%H5045><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

Out of the portion <S%H2256><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> was the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon: <S%H8095><s%> for the part <S%H2506><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> was too much <S%H7227><s%> for them: therefore the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> had their inheritance <S%H5157><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of them.

And the third <S%H7992><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was to Sarid: <S%H8301><s%>

And their border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up toward the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and Maralah, <S%H4831><s%> and reached <S%H6293><s%> to Dabbasheth, <S%H1708><s%> and reached <S%H6293><s%> to the river <S%H5158><s%> that is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Jokneam; <S%H3362><s%>

And turned <S%H7725><s%> from Sarid <S%H8301><s%> eastward <S%H6924><s%> toward the sun rise <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of Chislothtabor, <S%H3696><s%> and then goes <S%H3318><s%> out to Daberath, <S%H1705><s%> and goes <S%H5927><s%> up to Japhia, <S%H3309><s%>

And from there <S%H8033><s%> passes <S%H5674><s%> on along on the east <S%H6924><s%> to Gittahhepher, <S%H1662><s%> to Ittahkazin, <S%H6278><s%> and goes <S%H3318><s%> out to Remmonmethoar <S%H7417><s%> to Neah; <S%H5269><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> compasses <S%H5437><s%> it on the north <S%H6828><s%> side to Hannathon: <S%H2615><s%> and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> thereof are in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Jiphthahel: <S%H3317><s%>

And Kattath, <S%H7005><s%> and Nahallal, <S%H5096><s%> and Shimron, <S%H8110><s%> and Idalah, <S%H3030><s%> and Bethlehem: <S%H1035><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
And the fourth <S%H7243><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out to Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
And their border <S%H1366><s%> was toward Jezreel, <S%H3157><s%> and Chesulloth, <S%H3694><s%> and Shunem, <S%H7766><s%>
And Haphraim, <S%H2663><s%> and Shihon, <S%H7866><s%> and Anaharath, <S%H588><s%>
And Rabbith, <S%H7245><s%> and Kishion, <S%H7191><s%> and Abez, <S%H77><s%>
And Remeth, <S%H7432><s%> and Engannim, <S%H5873><s%> and Enhaddah, <S%H5876><s%> and Bethpazzez; <S%H1048><s%>

And the coast <S%H1366><s%> reaches <S%H6293><s%> to Tabor, <S%H8396><s%> and Shahazimah, <S%H7831><s%> and Bethshemesh; <S%H1053><s%> and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> of their border <S%H1366><s%> were at Jordan: <S%H3383><s%> sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> and their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
And the fifth <S%H2549><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
And their border <S%H1366><s%> was Helkath, <S%H2520><s%> and Hali, <S%H2482><s%> and Beten, <S%H991><s%> and Achshaph, <S%H407><s%>
And Alammelech, <S%H487><s%> and Amad, <S%H6008><s%> and Misheal; <S%H4861><s%> and reaches <S%H6293><s%> to Carmel <S%H3760><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> and to Shihorlibnath; <S%H7884><s%>

And turns <S%H7725><s%> toward the sun rise <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%> to Bethdagon, <S%H1016><s%> and reaches <S%H6293><s%> to Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> and to the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Jiphthahel <S%H3317><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> of Bethemek, <S%H1025><s%> and Neiel, <S%H5272><s%> and goes <S%H3318><s%> out to Cabul <S%H3521><s%> on the left <S%H8040><s%> hand, <S%H8040><s%>
And Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and Rehob, <S%H7340><s%> and Hammon, <S%H2540><s%> and Kanah, <S%H7071><s%> even to great <S%H7227><s%> Zidon; <S%H6721><s%>

And then the coast <S%H1366><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> to Ramah, <S%H7414><s%> and to the strong <S%H4013><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> Tyre; <S%H6865><s%> and the coast <S%H1366><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> to Hosah; <S%H2621><s%> and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> thereof are at the sea <S%H3220><s%> from the coast <S%H2256><s%> to Achzib: <S%H392><s%>
Ummah <S%H5981><s%> also, and Aphek, <S%H663><s%> and Rehob: <S%H7340><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

The sixth <S%H8345><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> even for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

And their coast <S%H1366><s%> was from Heleph, <S%H2501><s%> from Allon <S%H438><s%> to Zaanannim, <S%H6815><s%> and Adami, <S%H129><s%> Nekeb, <S%H5346><s%> and Jabneel, <S%H2995><s%> to Lakum; <S%H3946><s%> and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> thereof were at Jordan: <S%H3383><s%>

And then the coast <S%H1366><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to Aznothtabor, <S%H243><s%> and goes <S%H3318><s%> out from there <S%H8033><s%> to Hukkok, <S%H2712><s%> and reaches <S%H6293><s%> to Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%> side, and reaches <S%H6293><s%> to Asher <S%H836><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%> side, and to Judah <S%H3063><s%> on Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the sun rise. <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%>
And the fenced <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> are Ziddim, <S%H6661><s%> Zer, <S%H6863><s%> and Hammath, <S%H2575><s%> Rakkath, <S%H7557><s%> and Chinnereth, <S%H3672><s%>
And Adamah, <S%H128><s%> and Ramah, <S%H7414><s%> and Hazor, <S%H2674><s%>
And Kedesh, <S%H6943><s%> and Edrei, <S%H154><s%> and Enhazor, <S%H5877><s%>

And Iron, <S%H3375><s%> and Migdalel, <S%H4027><s%> Horem, <S%H2765><s%> and Bethanath, <S%H1043><s%> and Bethshemesh; <S%H1053><s%> nineteen <S%H8672><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> and their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
And the seventh <S%H7637><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
And the coast <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was Zorah, <S%H6881><s%> and Eshtaol, <S%H847><s%> and Irshemesh, <S%H5905><s%>
And Shaalabbin, <S%H8169><s%> and Ajalon, <S%H357><s%> and Jethlah, <S%H3494><s%>
And Elon, <S%H356><s%> and Thimnathah, <S%H8553><s%> and Ekron, <S%H6138><s%>
And Eltekeh, <S%H514><s%> and Gibbethon, <S%H1405><s%> and Baalath, <S%H1191><s%>
And Jehud, <S%H3055><s%> and Beneberak, <S%H1139><s%> and Gathrimmon, <S%H1667><s%>
And Mejarkon, <S%H4313><s%> and Rakkon, <S%H7542><s%> with the border <S%H1366><s%> before <S%H4136><s%> Japho. <S%H3305><s%>

And the coast <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out too little for them: therefore the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Leshem, <S%H3959><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> it, and smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and possessed <S%H3423><s%> it, and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> therein, and called <S%H7121><s%> Leshem, <S%H3959><s%> Dan, <S%H1835><s%> after the name <S%H8034><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> their father. <S%H1><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

When they had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of dividing the land <S%H776><s%> for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> by their coasts, <S%H1367><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them:

According <S%H5921><s%> to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> him the city <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he asked, <S%H7592><s%> even Timnathserah <S%H8556><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> and he built <S%H1129><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> therein.

These <S%H428><s%> are the inheritances, <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> divided for an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%> So they made an end <S%H3615><s%> of dividing <S%H2505><s%> the country. <S%H776><s%>
